name: Wood Mania Challenge
description:
Wood Mania Challenge has game play very simple: just drag, drop and fill up all the grid. let's enjoy a simple and addictive puzzle game! Simple but addictive puzzle game!

FEATURES
- Retro Games, Revisit the classics
- Fun, colorful and engaging graphics
- No time limit! A fun and relaxing puzzle game.
- Drag the wood block to fill block grid with one row or one column
- The wood blocks can not be rotated
- Smooth effect for Wood block puzzle game!
